name: Glaucoma eye drops prescribed by brand
title: of eye drops to treat glaucoma (either generically or by brand)
description: Prescribing of branded formulations of eye drops to treat glaucoma
as a percentage of prescribing of all eye drops to treat glaucoma
why_it_matters: There are a number of generic preparations available to treat glaucoma. These are cheaper than the branded equivalents.
numerator_where:
bnf_code LIKE '1106000__B%' --Treatment of Glaucoma (branded) 
AND 
bnf_code NOT LIKE '1106000B0B%' AND --Diamox 
bnf_code NOT LIKE '1106000C0B%' --Diamox (Parent)
denominator_where: bnf_code LIKE '1106000%') --Treatment of Glaucoma (branded and generic)
bnf_code NOT LIKE '1106000B0B%' AND --Acetazolamide (branded and generic)
